text.div:
Anaplastic Lymphoma Kinase Test

This value set includes codes from the following code systems:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://loinc.org
    Code Display
    47303-3 Anaplastic lymphoma kinase Ag [Presence] in Tissue by Immune stain
    78205-2 ALK gene rearrangements [Presence] in Blood or Tissue by FISH
    79206-9 inv(2)(p21;p23)(EML4,ALK) fusion transcript [Presence] in Blood or Tissue by FISH
    88744-8 inv(2)(p21;p23)(EML4,ALK) fusion transcript [Presence] in Tissue by Molecular genetics method
